price: Wahrlich, in Yusuf und seinen Brüdern sind Zeichen für diejenigen, die (nach der Wahrheit) fragen.
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
